summary: John Willard is identified as an alias of Eric Starvo Galt (also known as Harvey Lowmyer), who is suspected of assassinating Martin Luther King, Jr. The documents consist of cables disseminated by the CIA to various locations worldwide, seeking assistance in locating Galt/Lowmyer/Willard following the assassination. The cables provide information about Galt's aliases and physical description to aid in his apprehension.
significance: John Willard is an alias used by Eric Starvo Galt, the suspected assassin of Martin Luther King, Jr. The documents focus on disseminating information to aid in the apprehension of Galt under his various aliases.
